verses.text: \w I|strong="H0576"\w*, Nabuchodonosor, \w was|strong="H1934"\w* at rest \w in|strong="H1965"\w* my \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* flourishing \w in|strong="H1965"\w* my \w palace|strong="H1965"\w*:

I \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w that|strong="H2370"\w* affrighted \w me|strong="H1763"\w*: \w and|strong="H1763"\w* my thoughts \w in|strong="H5922"\w* my \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*, \w and|strong="H1763"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* my \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w* \w me|strong="H1763"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w set|strong="H7761"\w* forth \w a|strong="H7761"\w* \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w* should be \w brought|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w*, \w and|strong="H6925"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H1768"\w* should shew \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w came|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w diviners|strong="H1505"\w*, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* wise men, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3779"\w*, \w and|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* soothsayers, \w and|strong="H6925"\w* \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w told|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w*: \w but|strong="H0116"\w* \w they|strong="H0116"\w* did \w not|strong="H3809"\w* shew \w me|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof:

Till their colleague \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w came|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w me|strong="H6925"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* Baltassar, according \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w god|strong="H0426"\w*, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* hath \w in|strong="H0426"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*: \w and|strong="H1841"\w* \w I|strong="H1768"\w* \w told|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w him|strong="H6925"\w*.

Baltassar, prince \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* diviners, \w because|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* thou hast \w in|strong="H0426"\w* thee \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w*, \w and|strong="H7229"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* secret \w is|strong="H1768"\w* impossible \w to|strong="H0560"\w* thee: \w tell|strong="H0560"\w* me \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w visions|strong="H2376"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2493"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w have|strong="H0576"\w* \w seen|strong="H2370"\w*, \w and|strong="H7229"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w*.

This \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w vision|strong="H2376"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* my \w head|strong="H7217"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* my \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*: I \w saw|strong="H2370"\w*, \w and|strong="H0363"\w* \w behold|strong="H0431"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w tree|strong="H0363"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w midst|strong="H1459"\w* \w of|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, \w and|strong="H0363"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w height|strong="H7314"\w* thereof \w was|strong="H1934"\w* exceeding \w great|strong="H7690"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w tree|strong="H0363"\w* \w was|strong="H3606"\w* \w great|strong="H7236"\w*, \w and|strong="H7236"\w* \w strong|strong="H8631"\w*: \w and|strong="H7236"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w height|strong="H7314"\w* thereof \w reached|strong="H4291"\w* unto \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*: \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sight thereof \w was|strong="H3606"\w* even \w to|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* ends of \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*.

\w Its|strong="H4481"\w* leaves \w were|strong="H8065"\w* most \w beautiful|strong="H8209"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w its|strong="H4481"\w* \w fruit|strong="H0004"\w* exceeding \w much|strong="H7690"\w*: \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w in|strong="H1753"\w* \w it|strong="H8460"\w* \w was|strong="H3606"\w* \w food|strong="H4203"\w* \w for|strong="H4203"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w*: \w under|strong="H8460"\w* \w it|strong="H8460"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H1753"\w* cattle, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w in|strong="H1753"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w branches|strong="H6056"\w* thereof \w the|strong="H3606"\w* fowls \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* air had \w their|strong="H3606"\w* abode: \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1321"\w* did eat \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w it|strong="H8460"\w*.

\w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w vision|strong="H2376"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* my \w head|strong="H7217"\w* upon my \w bed|strong="H4903"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w behold|strong="H0431"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w watcher|strong="H5894"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* \w one|strong="H6922"\w* came down \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3652"\w* cried \w aloud|strong="H2429"\w*, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w thus|strong="H3652"\w*: \w Cut|strong="H7113"\w* \w down|strong="H1414"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w tree|strong="H0363"\w*, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w chop|strong="H1414"\w* \w off|strong="H7113"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w branches|strong="H6056"\w* thereof: shake \w off|strong="H7113"\w* \w its|strong="H7113"\w* leaves, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w scatter|strong="H0921"\w* \w its|strong="H7113"\w* fruits: let \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* fly away that are \w under|strong="H8479"\w* \w it|strong="H6853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3652"\w* \w the|strong="H0560"\w* \w birds|strong="H6853"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w its|strong="H7113"\w* \w branches|strong="H6056"\w*.

Nevertheless \w leave|strong="H7662"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* stump \w of|strong="H2920"\w* its \w roots|strong="H8330"\w* \w in|strong="H2508"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* let it be tied \w with|strong="H5974"\w* a \w band|strong="H0613"\w* \w of|strong="H2920"\w* \w iron|strong="H6523"\w*, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* \w of|strong="H2920"\w* brass, \w among|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w grass|strong="H6211"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* without, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* let it be wet \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w dew|strong="H2920"\w* \w of|strong="H2920"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H6523"\w* let its \w portion|strong="H2508"\w* be \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w wild|strong="H1251"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* \w in|strong="H2508"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w grass|strong="H6211"\w* \w of|strong="H2920"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*.

Let \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w heart|strong="H3825"\w* \w be|strong="H3825"\w* \w changed|strong="H8133"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w man’s|strong="H0606"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* let a \w beast’s|strong="H2423"\w* \w heart|strong="H3825"\w* \w be|strong="H3825"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* \w him|strong="H3052"\w*; \w and|strong="H0606"\w* let \w seven|strong="H7655"\w* \w times|strong="H5732"\w* \w pass|strong="H2499"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H3052"\w*.

This \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w decree|strong="H1510"\w* by \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w sentence|strong="H6600"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w watchers|strong="H5894"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* word \w And|strong="H0606"\w* demand \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* \w ones|strong="H6922"\w*; till \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w living|strong="H2417"\w* \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w most|strong="H5943"\w* \w High|strong="H5943"\w* ruleth \w in|strong="H4437"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w men|strong="H0606"\w*; \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w give|strong="H5415"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* whomsoever \w it|strong="H5922"\w* shall please \w him|strong="H6966"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* \w appoint|strong="H6966"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* basest \w man|strong="H0606"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* Nabuchodonosor \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w*: thou, \w therefore|strong="H6903"\w*, O Baltassar, \w tell|strong="H0560"\w* me quickly \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w*: \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w wise|strong="H2445"\w* \w men|strong="H2445"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* axe \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w able|strong="H3202"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w declare|strong="H0560"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* meaning \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w it|strong="H0607"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* me: \w but|strong="H1768"\w* thou art \w able|strong="H3202"\w*, \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7308"\w* \w of|strong="H0426"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* \w gods|strong="H0426"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H0426"\w* thee.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \w was|strong="H1841"\w* Baltassar, \w began|strong="H1841"\w* silently \w to|strong="H0560"\w* think within himself \w for|strong="H1768"\w* about \w one|strong="H2298"\w* hour: \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w his|strong="H1768"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H7476"\w* \w troubled|strong="H0927"\w* him. \w But|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* answering, \w said|strong="H0560"\w*: Baltassar, let not \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof trouble thee. Baltassar \w answered|strong="H6032"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w*: \w My|strong="H1768"\w* \w lord|strong="H4756"\w*, \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w dream|strong="H2493"\w* \w be|strong="H8160"\w* \w to|strong="H0560"\w* \w them|strong="H0560"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w hate|strong="H8131"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H0116"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* thereof \w to|strong="H0560"\w* thy enemies.

\w The|strong="H3606"\w* \w tree|strong="H0363"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* thou sawest \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H3606"\w* high \w and|strong="H7236"\w* \w strong|strong="H8631"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1768"\w* \w height|strong="H7314"\w* \w reached|strong="H4291"\w* \w to|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* skies, \w and|strong="H7236"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* sight thereof into \w all|strong="H3606"\w* tire \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*:

\w And|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w branches|strong="H6056"\w* thereof \w were|strong="H8065"\w* most \w beautiful|strong="H8209"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* its \w fruit|strong="H0004"\w* exceeding \w much|strong="H7690"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w in|strong="H1753"\w* \w it|strong="H8460"\w* \w was|strong="H3606"\w* \w food|strong="H4203"\w* \w for|strong="H4203"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w*, \w under|strong="H8460"\w* which \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w* \w of|strong="H1753"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w field|strong="H1251"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H1753"\w*, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w birds|strong="H6853"\w* \w of|strong="H1753"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* air had \w their|strong="H3606"\w* abode \w in|strong="H1753"\w* its \w branches|strong="H6056"\w*.

\w It|strong="H0607"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* thou, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w who|strong="H1768"\w* art \w grown|strong="H8631"\w* \w great|strong="H7236"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w become|strong="H7236"\w* mighty: \w for|strong="H1768"\w* thy \w greatness|strong="H7238"\w* hath \w grown|strong="H8631"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* hath \w reached|strong="H4291"\w* \w to|strong="H8065"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* thy power unto \w the|strong="H1768"\w* ends \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* whereas \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w saw|strong="H2370"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w watcher|strong="H5894"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w a|strong="H2370"\w* \w holy|strong="H6922"\w* \w one|strong="H6922"\w* come \w down|strong="H1414"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w say|strong="H0560"\w*: Cut \w down|strong="H1414"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w tree|strong="H0363"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w destroy|strong="H2255"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w*, \w but|strong="H1297"\w* \w leave|strong="H7662"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* stump \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w roots|strong="H8330"\w* thereof \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* let \w it|strong="H5922"\w* be bound \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w iron|strong="H6523"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* brass \w among|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w grass|strong="H1883"\w* without, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* let \w it|strong="H5922"\w* be sprinkled \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w dew|strong="H2920"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* let \w his|strong="H5922"\w* feeding be \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w wild|strong="H1251"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w*, till \w seven|strong="H7655"\w* \w times|strong="H5732"\w* \w pass|strong="H2499"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H4481"\w*.

\w This|strong="H1836"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6591"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* sentence \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w most|strong="H5943"\w* \w High|strong="H5943"\w*, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w come|strong="H4291"\w* upon \w my|strong="H1768"\w* \w lord|strong="H4756"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1768"\w* shall cast thee out \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w among|strong="H5974"\w* \w men|strong="H0606"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* thy \w dwelling|strong="H4070"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w cattle|strong="H8450"\w* \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w wild|strong="H1251"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2423"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* thou shalt \w eat|strong="H2939"\w* \w grass|strong="H6211"\w* \w as|strong="H1768"\w* an ox, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* shalt \w be|strong="H1934"\w* wet \w with|strong="H5974"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w dew|strong="H2920"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*: \w and|strong="H0606"\w* \w seven|strong="H7655"\w* \w times|strong="H5732"\w* shall \w pass|strong="H2499"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* thee, till thou \w know|strong="H3046"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w most|strong="H5943"\w* \w High|strong="H5943"\w* ruleth \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w men|strong="H0606"\w*, \w and|strong="H0606"\w* giveth \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* whomsoever \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H6211"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1768"\w* whereas \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0560"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* stump \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w roots|strong="H8330"\w* thereof, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w*, \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w tree|strong="H0363"\w*, should be \w left|strong="H7662"\w*: thy \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* shall remain \w to|strong="H0560"\w* thee \w after|strong="H4481"\w* thou shalt have \w known|strong="H3046"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* power \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*.

Wherefore, O \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, let my counsel \w be|strong="H1934"\w* acceptable \w to|strong="H5922"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* redeem thou thy \w sins|strong="H2408"\w* \w with|strong="H5922"\w* alms, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* thy \w iniquities|strong="H5758"\w* \w with|strong="H5922"\w* works \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2604"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* poor: \w perhaps|strong="H2006"\w* he \w will|strong="H4430"\w* forgive thy offences.
\w All|strong="H3606"\w* these \w things|strong="H3606"\w* \w came|strong="H4291"\w* upon \w king|strong="H4430"\w* Nabuchodonosor.
